description: This file defines a class 'JSONKnowledgeBase' that manages loading and processing JSON documents, both synchronously and asynchronously, from specified file paths or directories. It includes methods for iterating over document lists, validating JSON files, and loading documents with optional metadata handling.

classes.name: JSONKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that extends AgentKnowledge to provide functionality for managing JSON-based knowledge, including loading, validating, and iterating over JSON documents, with support for asynchronous operations and metadata handling.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Property that yields lists of Document objects from JSON files or directories, with support for metadata.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator that yields lists of Document objects from JSON files or directories.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a single JSON document from a specified path, with optional metadata, and processes it.

methods.name: aload_document
methods.description: Asynchronously loads a single JSON document from a specified path, with optional metadata, and processes it.

methods.name: _is_valid_json
methods.description: Helper method to check if a given path points to a valid JSON file based on existence, file type, and suffix.

methods.name: prepare_load
methods.description: Method (assumed inherited or defined elsewhere) to validate and prepare for loading documents.

methods.name: process_documents
methods.description: Method (assumed inherited or defined elsewhere) to process and store loaded documents.

methods.name: aprepare_load
methods.description: Asynchronous version of prepare_load, assumed to be inherited or defined elsewhere.

methods.name: aprocess_documents
methods.description: Asynchronous method to process documents, assumed to be inherited or defined elsewhere.
